successes.title: M2057 by Maria Pinto: Urban Chic Fashion Collection
successes.description: M2057 by Maria Pinto is a new line of womenswear inspired by urban architecture and design.

Pledges.description: Thank you for supporting M2057 by Maria Pinto! Receive a thank you note from me on a framable notecard featuring my "M2057 Ginko" painting. Your name will also be listed as a special supporter on the M2057 website and you will get special access to online previews of future seasons.
LIMITED EDITION PRINT. Prefer art to fashion? Get a limited edition signed print of my “Root Love” painting (11”x14”), as well as the THANK YOU GIFT listed above.
CIRCLE SCARF. Get all wrapped up in the Circle Scarf in the color of your choice. Additionally, receive the THANK YOU GIFT listed above.
ACCESSORY. Add a soft, luxurious layer to your look and select the Shrug, the Squares Wrap, or the Caress Wrap in the color of your choice. Additionally, receive the THANK YOU GIFT listed above.
DRESS OR JACKET. Select a dress or a jacket in the color of your choice. Additionally, receive the THANK YOU GIFT listed above.
DRESS + ACCESSORY. Select a dress + an accessory in the colors of your choice. Additionally, receive the THANK YOU GIFT listed above.
2 DRESSES OR DRESS/JACKET. Select 2 dresses or a dress + a jacket in the colors of your choice. Additionally, receive the THANK YOU GIFT listed above.

2 DRESSES + ACCESSORY OR DRESS/JACKET + ACCESSORY. Select 2 dresses + an accessory or a dress + a jacket + an accessory in the colors of your choice. Additionally, receive the THANK YOU GIFT listed above.
MINI COLLECTION. Select 2 dresses + a jacket + an accessory + a circle scarf in the colors of your choice. Additionally, receive the THANK YOU GIFT listed above.

STUDIO TIME. Want to see what being a fashion designer is really like? Spend half a day with me in my design studio, followed by lunch with me for you and 2 of your friends. You'll also receive 2 DRESSES of your choice and the THANK YOU GIFT.
*Backer must cover transportation costs to Chicago for themselves and guests.

CLOSET CONSULT + LOOKBOOK. Get a personal closet consult and styling session with me. I'll come to your house for a 4-hour session, and we'll go through your closet, put new outfits together with the pieces you have, get rid of stuff you don't wear or like, and identify what gaps need to be filled. Afterward I'll send you an electronic lookbook of your best outfits. You'll never say, "I have nothing to wear" again! You'll also receive 2 DRESSES of your choice and the THANK YOU GIFT.
*Backer must live in the Chicagoland area or cover transportation costs for Maria to travel to his/her location.

NAME A DRESS IN A FUTURE COLLECTION + ORIGINAL ILLUSTRATION. Along with the STUDIO TIME package listed above, get the opportunity to name a dress in a future collection. You’ll also receive a one-of-a-kind, hand-drawn, full-color illustration of the dress you named, drawn and signed by me, as well as 2 DRESSES of your choice and the THANK YOU GIFT.
